data.expected_result: The strike-through goes all the way through the message
data.short_description: Adding a strikethrough to a mention with space between the tildes and mention breaks the line
data.steps_to_repro: Send a message with a mention with a mention that is striked through - leave a space between the mention and the ~~ (refer second screenshot) -  Observe the strike through bar -You have to mention someone else, it doesn't work if you mention yourself.
